name: Girafficus (demo)
description:
Girafficus is a peculiar game. Will you survive this stranger's presence, or will you be swept into your untimely demise? Who knows! Maybe you'll have a great time and become friends!

There's many endings I have planned for this game, but this is only the demo version, and I still need to write the endings. It's gonna be great, though! I can promise you that!
